text: Tour of Taiyuan is a men's multi-day cycling race which takes place in China. It is rated as a 2.2 event on the UCI Asia Tour. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Winner !Second !Third |- |2019 | Cameron Piper | Luca Raggio | Jeroen Meijers |} ==References== Category:Cycle races in China Category:UCI Asia Tour races Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in China
title: Tour of Taiyuan
